answers.answer: I'd go broke buying test strips, because I'd be doing it every other day.LOL!!

question: So I'm back on Synthroid, looks like long-term now.  Went to Dr's today and we're in the process of fine-tuning the dosage and he mentions something to the effect of home-testing.  I was getting all excited, thinking that it would be something akin to diabetes testing with the drop of blood and the little machine reading your TSH level.   But, unfortunately this doesn't exist...yet.  But boy, wouldn't it be nice?
title: Wouldn't it be nice...
